name: RUST vs the HIVE
description:
"In the foggy greeness of the far future, there is only one hive mind. 
You, and old generation robot from before the singularity, try to keep your old ways, through violence... Being alone is what you were designed to like.
Try to stay away from the tempting features of the future, and eliminate the hive-lord."

Controls: 
Arrows/WASD for movement, mouse for aiming. Left/Right click for active weapons. Space to pick weapons.
